mutants.original_line: first_indices = [index for index, value in enumerate(first_list) if value == i]
mutants.mutated_line: first_indices = [index for (index, value) in enumerate(first_list) if value != i]

mutants.original_line: second_indices = [index for index, value in enumerate(second_list) if value == i]
mutants.mutated_line: second_indices = [index for (index, value) in enumerate(second_list) if value != i]
